notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The commentary of Japheth ben Ali ha-Levi on the Minor Prophets (books 5-12).

msItem.title: Perush nevi᾿im aḥaronim פרוש נביאים אחרונים

collation.p: Quires of mostly 10 leaves each. Signatures in Hebrew letters on the righ-hand upper corner of the first page, now partially lost.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental square and semi-cursive script of the 17th century. Shemu᾿el ben Barukh, the scribe of folios 1-142: inscribed in the colophon, folio , with a date of 5448 (1099, 1688) and Barukh, the scribe of folios 143-261, inscribed in the colophon, folio , with a date of 5448 (1688).

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Japhet ben Eli. Comm. on Minor Prophets. Vol. II. Arabic - Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2401.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 23 July 1881, folio [263v].
